name: Stella Universum
description:
-Submission to-

-Weekly Game Jam, Week 152-

-Beginner Friendly Game Jam- 

Journey through space as the last remaining survivors of humanity, in their spaceship, take a journey through the universe searching for another habitable planet.

A Bullet Hell where you never stop moving. Take cover from the occasional wave of bullets while constantly avoiding the forever growing amount of projectiles.

-This Game supports both PlayStation 4  and Xbox 1 Controllers-

Music Used:

From https://freemusicarchive.org/

-Komiku - Universe Big Take Down

-Komiku - Escaping The Collapsing Universe

The rest is by Canari Games:

https://canarigames.itch.io/canaripack-8bit-topdown
